subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Kenny Rogers, the so-called recruiter, has said that Newton’s father, Cecil Newton Sr., requested between $100,000 and $180,000 for his son to play at Mississippi State.
snippet: Kenny Rogers, the so-called recruiter, has said that Newton’s father, Cecil Newton Sr., requested between $100,000 and $180,000 for his son to play at Mississippi State.
